name: R5-VisionPrescription-R4B-VisionPrescription
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 VisionPrescription into FHIR R4B

element.display: Prescription for vision correction products for a patient

target.display: Prescription for vision correction products for a patient
target.comment: R5 `VisionPrescription` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription`
R5 `VisionPrescription.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.contained`
R5 `VisionPrescription.created` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.created`
R5 `VisionPrescription.dateWritten` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.dateWritten`
R5 `VisionPrescription.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.encounter`

R5 `VisionPrescription.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `VisionPrescription.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `VisionPrescription.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.id`
R5 `VisionPrescription.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `VisionPrescription.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.implicitRules`
R5 `VisionPrescription.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `VisionPrescription.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.add` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.add`

element.display: Lens meridian which contain no power for astigmatism

target.display: Lens meridian which contain no power for astigmatism
target.comment: R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.axis` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.axis`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.backCurve` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.backCurve`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.brand` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.brand`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.color` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.color`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.cylinder` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.cylinder`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.diameter` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.diameter`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.duration` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.duration`

R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.eye` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.eye` - eye has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/vision-eye-codes|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/vision-eye-codes|4.3.0 (Equivalent)
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `note`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.power` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.power`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.amount` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.amount`

R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.base` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.base` - base has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/vision-base-codes|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/vision-base-codes|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.product` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.product`
R5 `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.sphere` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.sphere`
R5 `VisionPrescription.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.meta`

R5 `VisionPrescription.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `VisionPrescription.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `VisionPrescription.patient` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.patient`
R5 `VisionPrescription.prescriber` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.prescriber`

R5 `VisionPrescription.status` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/fm-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/fm-status|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `VisionPrescription.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `VisionPrescription.text`
